title: FS: oversized Bill Bradley portrait miscut / 2-namer (Chief Bender)...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: FS: oversized Bill Bradley portrait miscut / 2-namer (Chief Bender)...
posts.post_content:
Oversized card of the Cleveland third baseman.  The card offers physical evidence that Bradley was positioned underneath Chief Bender in one particular T206 sheet layout.  This is the only one I've ever seen.

$350 net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations. 

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
